imdb.title: Re:Zero kara hajimeru isekai seikatsu
imdb.plot: After being suddenly transported to another world, Subaru Natsuki and his new female partner are brutally murdered. However, Subaru awakens to a familiar scene, meeting the same girl again. The day begins to mysteriously repeat it...

episodes.title: Break Time 1: World 1-1
episodes.plot: A series of comedic shorts featuring chibi versions of the characters of the main show.

episodes.title: Break Time 2: World 1-4, Side A
episodes.plot: A series of comedic shorts featuring chibi versions of the characters of the main show.

episodes.title: Break Time 3: World 1-4, Epilogue
episodes.plot: A series of comedic shorts featuring chibi versions of the characters of the main show.

episodes.title: Break Time 4: World 2-1
episodes.plot: A series of comedic shorts featuring chibi versions of the characters of the main show.

episodes.title: Break Time 5: World 2-2
episodes.plot: A series of comedic shorts featuring chibi versions of the characters of the main show.

episodes.title: Break Time 6: World 2-3
episodes.plot: A series of comedic shorts featuring chibi versions of the characters of the main show.

episodes.title: Break Time 7: World 2-4
episodes.plot: A series of comedic shorts featuring chibi versions of the characters of the main show.

episodes.title: Re: Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu: Hyouketsu no Kizuna
episodes.plot: In this prequel to Re:Zero Starting Life in a New World From Zero, we learn how Puck and Emilia met. We also learn about why Emilia is insecure.

episodes.title: Each One's Promise
episodes.plot: Subaru and the others celebrate their victory over the White Whale. However, all of a sudden Rem's entire existence becomes erased again, leading a despondent Subaru to figure out what happened.

episodes.title: The Next Location
episodes.plot: Subaru and Emilia return home, only to discover that the village is empty and Roswaal gone. To find their friends and save Rem, the two head off to the mysterious Sanctuary.

episodes.title: The Long-Awaited Reunion
episodes.plot: Subaru comes face to face with Echidna, the Witch of Greed, and learns of what has happened to the other residents of the village.

episodes.title: Parent and Child
episodes.plot: Subaru meets his parents again during the trial offered by the greed witch. What starting a new life in an isekai truly mean.

episodes.title: A Step Forward
episodes.plot: Emilia continues attempting the trials of the Sanctuary. Meanwhile, Subaru faces a mysterious meeting with Roswaal.

episodes.title: The Maiden's Gospel
episodes.plot: Subaru tries to do everything differently this time so that he doesn't have to end up with the horrifying results. Will his plans work out this time?

episodes.title: Friend
episodes.plot: Subaru finds out something he never did in his past life. He faces some unpredictable events during the third restart.

episodes.title: The Value of Life
episodes.plot: Subaru tries to escape The Sanctuary with the aid of Otto and Ram, he learns more about Beatrice.

episodes.title: Love Love Love Love Love Love You
episodes.plot: Echidna begins to tell Subaru about the witch who gave him the power and set him on this agonizing path.

episodes.title: I Know Hell
episodes.plot: Subaru takes the responsibility to suffer the pains all by himself so that nobody has to get hurt.

episodes.title: The Taste of Death
episodes.plot: The situation gets more and more complicated as Subaru keeps facing new horrifying situations. Can he get out these events in one piece?

episodes.title: The Witches' Tea Party
episodes.plot: Subaru understands something about his ability 'Return by Death' that he never considered. He gets invited to another tea party with Echidna where he uncovers some important things about her.

episodes.title: The Sounds That Make You Want to Cry
episodes.plot: Subaru faces the Seven Witches and their Authority. He comes to realize something he never considered is possible.

episodes.title: Straight Bet
episodes.plot: With all odds stacked against him, Subaru makes a risky bet.

episodes.title: Otto Suwen/A Reason to Believe
episodes.plot: Tasked with slowing down Garfiel, Otto uses everything at his disposal. Meanwhile Emilia and Subaru trade words.

episodes.title: Nobody Can Lift a Quain Stone Alone
episodes.plot: Outraged and clouded by the trauma of his past, Garfiel goes to destroy the entrance of the Sanctuary but Subaru and Emilia stand in his way.

episodes.title: A Journey Through Memories
episodes.plot: Emilia and Echidna hike through the forest in which a younger Emilia once lived to piece together the fragments of her forgotten past.

episodes.title: The Day Alpha Orionis Smiled
episodes.plot: With Regulus's sudden and unexpected appearance, the safety of the seal is in question. Forutuna and Geuse fight against the oncoming threat. Meanwhile, outside the trial, Subaru and company receive a shocking revelation.

episodes.title: The Permafrost of Elior Forest
episodes.plot: Upon reaching at the seal, Emilia was surprised to see Pandora already waiting for her arrival. Pandora offers Emilia salvation of the forest, but the cost is breaking her promise to Mother Fortuna.

episodes.title: The Beginning of the Sanctuary and the Beginning of the End
episodes.plot: Subaru, now armed with the knowledge of the events that led to Sanctuary's creation and the support his allies, once again faces off against Roswaal as Sanctuary's past is revealed.

episodes.title: Reunion of Roars
episodes.plot: After facing off against Roswaal, Subaru heads to Roswaal's mansion along with Garfiel and Otto. Meanwhile, Ram has a long conversation with Emilia and she requests her to do a favor for her.

episodes.title: Happiness Reflected on the Water's Surface
episodes.plot: Garfiel faces off against Elsa, Ram and Puck faces off against Roswaal, Subaru confronts Beatrice, and Emilia confronts her second trial. Each have their own duty that they must complete.

episodes.title: Love Me Down to My Blood and Guts
episodes.plot: Garfiel and Frederica continue their fight with Elsa and Meili while Subaru, Otto, and Petra are trying to take down the Guiltylowe, in the meantime, Ram and Puck are fighting Roswaal, and Emilia is facing the third trial.

episodes.title: Choose me
episodes.plot: In the midst of the sudden snowstorm, Emilia reunites with the villagers. Meanwhile, in the fiery mansion, Subaru continues to look for Beatrice.

episodes.title: Offbeat Steps Under the Moonlight
episodes.plot: The final battle of the Sanctuary reaches its climax as Emilia, Subaru, and Beatrice attempt to annihilate the Great Rabbit once and for all.

episodes.title: The End of the Beginning and the Beginning of the End
episodes.plot: A young man is summoned to a different reality. He begins a search for who did this and why.

episodes.title: Reunion with the Witch
episodes.plot: Subaru discovers that his special magical ability is quite a pain.

episodes.title: Starting Life from Zero in Another World
episodes.plot: Subaru attempts to buy the insignia from Felt and return it to Satella before Elsa arrives at the loot house, but Satella arrives before the negotiations are complete, and Elsa still attacks them.

episodes.title: The Happy Roswaal Mansion Family
episodes.plot: After being badly wounded by Elsa, Subaru somehow survived and awoke in the mansion of Margrave Mathers, in the Kingdom of Lugunica.

episodes.title: The Morning of Our Promise Is Still Distant
episodes.plot: Subaru is hysteric after mysteriously Returning by Death in the middle of the night. Everything that he has accomplished so far; including his date with Emilia has completely vanished.

episodes.title: The Sound of Chains
episodes.plot: Subaru's first day at the Roswaal Mansion begins for a 3rd time. First, he died of weakness, and the second time, he was murdered by an attacker. Subaru makes it his mission to uncover the identity of the attacker.

episodes.title: Natsuki Subaru's Restart
episodes.plot: The identity of the attacker is shockingly revealed to Subaru. Subaru can feel everything crumbling around him as he dies again. This loop however, the fourth night passes without incident and Subaru experiences a shocking revelation.

episodes.title: I Cried, Cried My Lungs Out, and Stopped Crying
episodes.plot: Subaru's first day in Roswaal's mansion begins for the fifth time. Determined to save everyone this time, he makes it a point to keep his best smile on his face in order to earn the trust of the mansion's staff.

episodes.title: The Meaning of Courage
episodes.plot: As the pieces start to fall into place, Subaru realizes the shaman is in the village. He heads to the village with Ram and Rem in attempt to undercover the identity of the shaman. A jolting revelation sends Subaru into a frenzy.

episodes.title: Fanatical Methods Like a Demon
episodes.plot: After risking his life to save the children of the village, Subaru was so powerfully cursed that the only chance of survival was the complete extermination of the Ulgarm. Subaru is about to give up when he realizes Rem has disappeared.

episodes.title: Rem
episodes.plot: Knocked unconscious by Subaru's attack, Rem dreams of an event in her past that she and Ram would rather forget. After waking up, she tells Subaru that she's just committed the same sin again.

episodes.title: Return to the Royal Capital
episodes.plot: By order of the council of elders, Wilhelm and Felis visit Roswaal's mansion as emissaries. Emilia and Subaru head to the imperial capital.

episodes.title: Self Proclaimed Knight, Natsuki Subaru
episodes.plot: According to a new prophecy seen on the Dragon Stone, there are five priestesses with the potential to be the kingdom's next ruler.

episodes.title: The Sickness Called Despair
episodes.plot: Rejected by the one who meant more to him than anything, Subaru is still unable to recognize that he may have done something irreversible. He then finds out that some disturbing movement has been detected within Roswaal's domain.

episodes.title: The Outside of Madness
episodes.plot: Subaru stares off in horror amidst Rem's mangled corpse. Everyone in the mansion has been massacred. A resentful voice calls out to Subaru as both his mind and body violently break down among the bodies of the people he loves.

episodes.title: The Greed of a Pig
episodes.plot: Subaru and rem look for assistance to save Emilia and all who reside in Roswaal's domain.

episodes.title: Disgrace in the Extreme
episodes.plot: A beast looms over Subaru and his travelling companions. Among the thick fog and shrill cries of the massive figure, Rem decides to make the ultimate sacrifice for the person she loves the most in this world.

episodes.title: From Zero
episodes.plot: Subaru failed to protect everyone in the village after the witch cult killed everybody in there, then he was returned by death. Subaru tries to escape the land with Rem after giving up on everything until Rem starts speaking to him.

episodes.title: Battle Against the White Whale
episodes.plot: To save Emilia, Subaru approaches Crusch to negotiate the formation of an alliance. His terms are a bit difficult for Crusch to believe, but she can see that Subaru isn't lying.

episodes.title: Wilhelm van Astrea
episodes.plot: The battle against the white whale begins.

episodes.title: A Wager That Defies Despair
episodes.plot: Subaru and Rem lose all words at the sight unfolding above them. Just when it seemed they would soon have the White Whale cornered, the battle takes a turn that no one expected.

episodes.title: A Flash of Sloth
episodes.plot: The mercenary army that had been blocking the road during the White Whale subjugation returns to join the main force. Under the leadership of Subaru, the mercenary force convenes on the Mathers domain to destroy the witch's cult.

episodes.title: Nefarious Sloth
episodes.plot: Subaru and his companions head toward Roswaal's mansion to evacuate Emilia and all the others there, stopping at the nearby village on the way and beginning to evacuate its residents as well. However, the situation takes a turn that nobody expected.

episodes.title: The Self-Proclaimed Knight and the Most Valuable Knight
episodes.plot: Emilia tried to warn the villagers of Arlam that danger was coming and they should evacuate, but was not well-received. As she's pondering what more she can do, Wilhelm arrives at the mansion with a message.

episodes.title: That's All This Story Is About
episodes.plot: Subaru and Julius are fighting Betelgeuse by utilizing spirit arts to allow Julius to see through Subaru's eyes. This time, however, Subaru speaks his 'Return by Death' to have Betelgeuse come in contact with the spirit of Satella.

episodes.title: OVA: Memory Snow
episodes.plot: Subaru and friends defeat the Demon Beast Wolgarm, the source of the curse, and save the children of Irlam village. The characters finally get a moment of peace, and Subaru goes on a certain secret mission that he must not let anyone find out about. However, even though Subaru is wearing a disguise, Petra and other children of the village immediately figure out who he is. Now that his mission was exposed within five seconds of it starting, Subaru's "date" with Emilia could be ruined.

episodes.title: OVA: Bond of Ice
episodes.plot: This OVA shows Emilia and her meeting with Puck during the journey to Roswaal Mansion to be a candidate for the royal election.
